avatar.name: Hysilens
avatar.description:
Styxia, the coastal city of intoxication and dreams, where echoes of old songs still drift among the waves.
Helektra, Daughter of the Sea, Chrysos Heir who cleanses the Ocean's Coreflame, dispels the murky undercurrents and orchestrates a banquet of revelry for the heroes beyond the sky.
The show must go on. Even if hope is as fragile as bubbles, the waves will keep surging forward.

skills.name: Aeolian Mode: Echoes in Still Waters
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Hysilens's ATK to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Overtone Hum: Chorus After Dark Tides
skills.description: Has a **2[i]%** **base chance** to increase the DMG taken by all enemies by ****3[i]%****, lasting for **4[i]** turn(s). At the same time, deals Physical DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Hysilens's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: Maelstrom Rhapsody
skills.description:
Hysilens deploys a Zone that reduces enemy targets' ATK by **6[f1]%** and DEF by ****3[f1]%****, and deals Physical DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Hysilens's ATK to all enemies.
For every 1 instance of DoT taken by an enemy target within the Zone, Hysilens deals Physical DoT equal to ****4[f1]%**** of her ATK to them. This damage triggers at the start of each turn or after one attack by an ally target, up to **5[i]** time(s). And it cannot repeatedly trigger this effect.
The Zone lasts for **2[i]** turn(s) and this duration decreases by 1 at the start of this unit's every turn. When Hysilens gets **knocked down**, the Zone will also be dispelled.

skills.name: Sirenic Serenade
skills.description:
When an ally target attacks, there is a **1[i]%** **base chance** for Hysilens to inflict the hit enemy target with one of the following states: Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock. Priority is given to inflicting a different state.
While in the Wind Shear/Burn/Shock state, at the start of each turn, the enemy target takes Wind/Fire/Lightning DoT equal to ****2[f1]%**** of Hysilens's ATK for **5[i]** turn(s).
While in the Bleed state, at the start of each turn, the enemy target takes Physical DoT equal to **3[f1]%** of their Max HP, up to ****4[f1]%**** of Hysilens's ATK, lasting for **5[i]** turn(s).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: At Ocean's Abode
skills.description:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for **1[i]** seconds and automatically moves forward. Enemies within the Special Dimension enter the "Soulstruck" state. "Soulstruck" enemies will not attack ally targets and will follow the dimension while it persists.
After entering combat with "Soulstruck" enemies, there is a **2[i]%** **base chance** to inflict each enemy target with **3[i]** of the following states: Wind Shear/Bleed/Burn/Shock, all of which are equivalent to those provided by Hysilens's Talent effect. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

tree.name: Aeolian Mode: Echoes in Still Waters
tree.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Hysilens's ATK to one designated enemy.

tree.name: Overtone Hum: Chorus After Dark Tides
tree.description: Has a **2[i]%** **base chance** to increase the DMG taken by all enemies by ****3[i]%****, lasting for **4[i]** turn(s). At the same time, deals Physical DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Hysilens's ATK to all enemies.

The Zone lasts for **2[i]** turn(s) and this duration decreases by 1 at the start of this unit's every turn. When Hysilens gets **knocked down**, the Zone will also be dispelled.

tree.description:

While in the Wind Shear/Burn/Shock state, at the start of each turn, the enemy target takes Wind/Fire/Lightning DoT equal to ****2[f1]%**** of Hysilens's ATK for **5[i]** turn(s).
While in the Bleed state, at the start of each turn, the enemy target takes Physical DoT equal to **3[f1]%** of their Max HP, up to ****4[f1]%**** of Hysilens's ATK, lasting for **5[i]** turn(s).

tree.name: At Ocean's Abode
tree.description:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for **1[i]** seconds and automatically moves forward. Enemies within the Special Dimension enter the "Soulstruck" state. "Soulstruck" enemies will not attack ally targets and will follow the dimension while it persists.
After entering combat with "Soulstruck" enemies, there is a **2[i]%** **base chance** to inflict each enemy target with **3[i]** of the following states: Wind Shear/Bleed/Burn/Shock, all of which are equivalent to those provided by Hysilens's Talent effect. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

tree.name: The Gladius of Conquest
tree.description: At the start of combat, Hysilens deploys a Zone, equivalent to that provided by her Ultimate, lasting for **3** turn(s). Whenever Hysilens deploys a Zone, she recovers **1** Skill Point(s).

tree.name: The Bubble of Banquets
tree.description: When Hysilens uses Ultimate, if the enemy target is currently afflicted with DoT(s), all DoTs currently applied on the target will immediately produce DMG equal to **150%** of their original DMG.

tree.name: The Fiddle of Pearls
tree.description: For every **10%** of Hysilens's Effect Hit Rate that exceeds **60%**, increases her DMG dealt by **15%**, up to a max increase of **90%**.

ranks.name: You Ask Why Hearts Cry
ranks.description: While Hysilens is on the field, the DoT dealt by ally targets is equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their original value. When Hysilens inflicts Wind Shear/Bleed/Burn/Shock on enemies via her Talent, there is a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to additionally inflict the target with 1 instance of Wind Shear/Bleed/Burn/Shock state that is equivalent to those from the original Talent effect and can coexist with such pre-existing states.

ranks.name: Tell Me Why Waves Roar High
ranks.description: While the Zone is active, the DMG Boost effect from Trace "The Fiddle of Pearls" applies to all allies.

ranks.name: Why Do Lights Bid Goodbye
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Lo, How Time Flows By
ranks.description: While the Zone is active, reduces All-Type RES of all enemies by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: In Ablution, I Hum and Sigh
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: When to Return From Where You Lie
ranks.description: While the Zone is active, at the start of each turn or after one attack by an ally target, increases the maximum trigger count for Hysilens's Physical DoT effect to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>, and increases the multiplier of the DMG dealt by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

avatar.name: Cerydra
avatar.description:
The Northern Empire, a lost dynasty, where its frozen lands burn with the fever of conquest.
Sovereign Cerydra, the Chrysos Heir who wields the Coreflame of "Law," weaves her schemes, contends with the gods, passes judgment upon the faithless, and lays the foundation of Flame-Chase into this world.
...**"This is far from the end. Amphoreus's journey is set to blaze across the stars!"**

skills.name: King's Castling
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Cerydra's ATK to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Pawn's Promotion
skills.description: Grants "Military Merit" to one designated ally character and gives Cerydra **2[i]** points of Charge. Charge is capped at **3[i]** points. When Charge reaches **4[i]** points, automatically upgrades the character's "Military Merit" to "Peerage" and dispels their **Crowd Control debuffs**. The character with "Peerage" is considered to have "Military Merit" simultaneously. The character with "Peerage" increases the CRIT DMG for their dealt Skill DMG by ****1[i]%****, increases their All-Type **RES PEN** by ****5[f1]%****, and triggers **Coup de Main** when using their Skill on enemy targets. After **Coup de Main** ends, consumes **4[i]** points of Charge to revert "Peerage" to "Military Merit."

skills.name: Scholar's Mate
skills.description: Gains **2[i]** Charge. Deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Cerydra's ATK to all enemies. If no character on the field has "Military Merit," prioritizes granting "Military Merit" to the first character in the current team.

skills.name: Ave Imperator
skills.description: The character with "Military Merit" increases ATK by an amount equal to ****2[f1]%**** of Cerydra's ATK. When the character uses Basic ATK or Skill, Cerydra gains **1[i]** Charge. During **Coup de Main**, Cerydra cannot gain Charge. After the character with "Military Merit" uses an attack, Cerydra additionally deals 1 instance of Wind **Additional DMG** equal to ****3[i]%**** of her ATK. This effect can trigger up to **4[i]** time(s). The trigger count resets every time Cerydra uses her Ultimate. "Military Merit" only takes effect on the most recent target. When the target changes, Cerydra's Charge is reset to 0.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: First-Move Advantage
skills.description: After using Technique, gains "Military Merit." When switching the active character, "Military Merit" transfers to the current active character. At the start of the next battle, automatically uses Skill 1 time on the character with "Military Merit" without consuming any Skill Points.

tree.name: King's Castling
tree.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Cerydra's ATK to one designated enemy.

tree.name: Pawn's Promotion
tree.description: Grants "Military Merit" to one designated ally character and gives Cerydra **2[i]** points of Charge. Charge is capped at **3[i]** points. When Charge reaches **4[i]** points, automatically upgrades the character's "Military Merit" to "Peerage" and dispels their **Crowd Control debuffs**. The character with "Peerage" is considered to have "Military Merit" simultaneously. The character with "Peerage" increases the CRIT DMG for their dealt Skill DMG by ****1[i]%****, increases their All-Type **RES PEN** by ****5[f1]%****, and triggers **Coup de Main** when using their Skill on enemy targets. After **Coup de Main** ends, consumes **4[i]** points of Charge to revert "Peerage" to "Military Merit."

tree.name: Scholar's Mate
tree.description: Gains **2[i]** Charge. Deals Wind DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Cerydra's ATK to all enemies. If no character on the field has "Military Merit," prioritizes granting "Military Merit" to the first character in the current team.

tree.name: Ave Imperator
tree.description: The character with "Military Merit" increases ATK by an amount equal to ****2[f1]%**** of Cerydra's ATK. When the character uses Basic ATK or Skill, Cerydra gains **1[i]** Charge. During **Coup de Main**, Cerydra cannot gain Charge. After the character with "Military Merit" uses an attack, Cerydra additionally deals 1 instance of Wind **Additional DMG** equal to ****3[i]%**** of her ATK. This effect can trigger up to **4[i]** time(s). The trigger count resets every time Cerydra uses her Ultimate. "Military Merit" only takes effect on the most recent target. When the target changes, Cerydra's Charge is reset to 0.

tree.name: First-Move Advantage
tree.description: After using Technique, gains "Military Merit." When switching the active character, "Military Merit" transfers to the current active character. At the start of the next battle, automatically uses Skill 1 time on the character with "Military Merit" without consuming any Skill Points.

tree.name: Veni
tree.description: For every **100** of Cerydra's ATK that exceeds **2000**, increases her CRIT DMG by **18%**, up to a max increase of **360%**.

tree.name: Vidi
tree.description: Increases Cerydra's CRIT Rate by **100%**. While Cerydra's Charge is below its maximum, the character with "Military Merit" using their Ultimate grants Cerydra **1** Charge. This effect can trigger once per battle.

tree.name: Vici
tree.description: When using Skill, increases SPD by **20** for this unit and the teammate with "Military Merit," lasting for **3** turn(s). When the character with "Military Merit" uses Basic ATK or Skill, regenerates **5** Energy for Cerydra.

ranks.name: Seize the Crowns of All
ranks.description: The character with "Military Merit" ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the targets' DEF when dealing DMG. If "Military Merit" has been upgraded to "Peerage," then the character additionally ignores <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of the targets' DEF when dealing Skill DMG. When Cerydra uses her Skill, regenerates <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> Energy for the designated ally target.

ranks.name: Forge the Dreams of Many
ranks.description: The character with "Military Merit" deals <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> increased DMG. While a teammate on the field has "Military Merit," Cerydra's DMG dealt increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Torch the Laws of Old
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Help and Hurt Repaid in Full
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: A Journey Set Starward
ranks.description: The character with "Military Merit" increases their All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, and the multiplier for the <u>Additional DMG</u> triggered via "Military Merit" increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>. While a teammate on the field has "Military Merit," Cerydra's All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

weapon.name: The Forever Victual
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. After the wearer uses Skill, increases ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, stacking up to <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> times.

weapon.name: Why Does the Ocean Sing
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When an enemy target gets inflicted with a debuff by the wearer, there is a <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> base chance for them to enter "Enthrallment," lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). Effects of the same type cannot stack. While the target is in "Enthrallment," for every 1 debuff applied by the wearer on the target, increases the target's received DoT by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[f1]%</unbreak></color>, stacking up to <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> time(s). When the target gets attacked by an ally, increases the attacker's SPD by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#6[f1]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#7[i]</unbreak> turn(s). When the wearer gets knocked down, removes all "Enthrallment."

weapon.name: Epoch Etched in Golden Blood
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. After using Ultimate to attack, recovers <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> Skill Point(s). After the wearer uses their Skill on one ally character, increases the Skill DMG dealt by the target by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[f1]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

item.name: Sea Siren's Torn Fin
item.description: Lady of Crashing Waves's spiny tail fin. Can be used for the Ascension of Ice characters.

item.name: Chrysos Spoon
item.description: A legendary cooking utensil used by fairies. It can be used to superimpose the Light Cone "The Forever Victual."

item.name: A Taste of Happiness
item.description: After obtaining Phone Wallpapers, they can be changed in the Phone function.

item.name: Fairy Gold Coin
item.description: The currency used in Membrance Maze, modeled after fairy-like creatures. Earned through restaurant operations, it can be used for various expenses during business management.

item.name: The Herta Contract: Strategic Support
item.description: The Herta and the Express have achieved a strategic agreement. She has increased her support for the Express to better uncover precious things found during trailblazing expeditions.

item.name: Abundance of Luck
item.description: Upon use, immediately regenerates **30%** Energy for all allies and increases DMG dealt by **15%** for the next battle.
